attributes.action: Stop ignoring the opinions expressed in petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's all very well setting up websites for petitions and saying you're listening to the opinions of your people etc., but if you choose to ignore them all the time and insist that 'I know best' then you are not only hurting the people and the country but also yourself. You must show some faith in the opinions of the people occasionally and act on them. Of course people are as a rule stupid and get things completely wrong, but this doesn't make their opinions incorrect and sometimes they are more valuable than your own.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
